article.headline: UC Irvine 67, UC Riverside 53
article.story: IRVINE, Calif. (AP) -- Patrick Sanders scored 21 points to lead UC Irvine to a 67-63 victory over UC Riverside on Saturday. Darren Fells had 16 points and five rebounds and Michael Hunter added 10 points, seven rebounds and two blocks for the Anteaters (8-11, 3-3 Big West). Sanders scored 12 of Irvine?s final 14 points of the first half to erase a nine-point deficit. His jumper with 7:10 left in the half ended an Anteater scoring drought that lasted nearly four minutes. He then scored eight points in the half's final two minutes, including a 25-foot 3-pointer with less than a second left in the half to give UC Irvine a 30-28 lead. UC Riverside (4-14, 1-6) tied the score at 37-37 with 15:34 left in the game, but four points from Sanders and a Brett Lauer 3-pointer helped the Anteaters pull away. Larry Cunningham led the Highlanders with 12 points and Jaloni Diggs added 11. Riverside fell to 0-11 on the road.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
